Publish.LongDescription:
# Private alpha for Platter.
## Disclaimer: This is an experimental, potentially unstable release. Expect issues and bugs, not everything may work as it should. Always backup your saves. Use at your own risk.
## Please report any issues and share feedback on Discord. Include the following logs:
- `%localappdata%low\Colossal Order\Cities Skylines II\logs\Platter.log` - `%localappdata%low\Colossal Order\Cities Skylines II\logs\Player.log`
Publish.ChangeLog: - **Improved tool options UI**: Moved to the top. Increased height of pre-zone panel, hide options when not needed. Added ellipsis to longer zone names overflowing the menu. - **New Controls**: Control Parcel size and road setback with the new mouse wheel controls - **New Shortcut**: Add "CTRL+P" shortcut to open the platter menu - **Fixed vanilla line tool**: Patched calculation of spacing when using the line tool, allowing the use of the vanilla line tool with parcels - **Better compatibility with Object Tool**: Remove "rotation" options when snapping. Remove snapping when using line tool. - **Reworked options UI**: Added new options. Rearranged existing ones for clarity - **Reworked tutorial**: Updated tutorial text and images to account for new UI and new features
